title: 命令方块NBT问题，点进来.
author: Minecraft_nan
txt_content:
RT
我想搞一个幽灵
就是小白自定义装备的NBT加上隐身药水效果的NBT何在一起
但是我把两个NBT用，;和空格隔开都不行，他说数据标签分析失败
两个nbt怎么何在一起？
是这样的两个NBT：{Equipment:[{id:290,Count:1},{},{},{id:299,Count:1},{id:397:0,Count:1}]}和{ActiveEffects:[{id:14,Duration:9999999,Amoplifier:5,Ambient:1}]}


求啊，怎么何在一起!

replies.author: Minecraft_nan
replies.txt_content:
chyx 发表于 2015-7-3 12:19
{Equipment:[{id:290,Count:1},{},{},{id:299,Count:1},{id:397:0,Count:1}],ActiveEffects:[{id:14,Durati ...
为什么这样药水效果就没了？
你还是不是在领地范围弄的，有可能不刷怪

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {Equipment:[{id:290,Count:1},{},{},{id:299,Count:1},{id:397:0,Count:1}],ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,Duration:9999999,Amplifier:50,Ambient:1}]}

你多写了一个字母Amoplifier

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2015-7-3 13:19
/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {Equipment:[{id:290,Count:1},{},{},{id:299,Count:1},{id:397:0,Count:1}],Acti ...
在你给我加分之前就看见你的回复了 
你的下次猜猜乐什么时候？

replies.author: Minecraft_nan
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2015-7-3 13:19
/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {Equipment:[{id:290,Count:1},{},{},{id:299,Count:1},{id:397:0,Count:1}],Acti ...
还是不行啊啊啊啊啊

replies.author: Minecraft_nan
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2015-7-3 13:19
/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {Equipment:[{id:290,Count:1},{},{},{id:299,Count:1},{id:397:0,Count:1}],Acti ...
谢了，才发现id的i没大写....
